facts.fact_text: DAX 40 closed 0.9% higher at 24,721.5 on Friday.

evidences.evidence_text: DAX Finishes on Higher Note Frankfurt's DAX 40 managed to close about 0.9% firmer at 24,721.5 on Friday, halting a three-day losing streak and outperforming its peers.
Siemens Energy (+3.9%) outperformed, boosted by better-than-expected results and strong 2026 guidance from US peer Bloom Energy.

facts.fact_text: Renk surged 6.1% after BNP Paribas and French broker Exane raised their ratings on the stock.

evidences.evidence_text: Renk surged 6.1% after BNP Paribas and French broker Exane raised their ratings on the stock.

facts.fact_text: For the week, the DAX index rose 0.7%.

evidences.evidence_text: For the week, the index rose 0.7%.

evidence.evidence_text: Traders assessed a fresh batch of corporate earnings from both sides of the Atlantic, with nervousness around AI-massive spending easing somewhat.
